title: What is the interpretation of seeing watches in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Watches on the finger have many meanings for their owners, and many people want to know these meanings in clear and ambiguous terms. The following article will help you achieve your goal, so let's read the following. What is the interpretation of a dream about watches in a dream? Seeing long hours in a dream is an indication that he will be able to achieve many goals that he has striven for for a long time, and he will be proud of himself for what he will be able to achieve. If one sees watches in his dream, this is a sign of good news that will reach him in the coming days and will be very enjoyable for him. If the dreamer sees his watch during his sleep, this symbolizes his desire to take an important step in his life, but he feels stressed and anxious about not achieving this. It indicates The dreamer seeing watches in a dream indicates good things that will happen in his life in the coming days and will make him very happy. Watches in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer seeing watches in a dream as a sign that he has overcome many problems that have greatly hindered his life and that he feels satisfied. After that. If a person sees watches in his hands in his dream, this is a sign that he will receive a lot of money that will make him pay what he owes. If the dreamer sees a pure gold watch during his sleep, this means that he is recovering from a physical illness that exhausted him a lot and his health condition is improving. Gradually. Seeing the dreamer in his dream buying a new watch symbolizes that there are many changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and will be very rewarding for him. What is the interpretation of seeing clock hands in a single woman’s dream? Watches in a single woman’s dream show that she will soon be proposed to Someone who matches her very precisely and she will be very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees a gold watch in her dream, this is a sign that her future partner is a very wealthy person who will work to meet all her demands and desires. If a girl sees her watch in her dream and it is not working, this indicates that she rejects many things. Of the marriage opportunities that she gets because she has not yet found what suits her. Seeing the dreamer in her dream of buying a watch symbolizes the achievement of many things that she has always dreamed of and will be very pleased with. Interpretation of clock 1 in a dream for a single woman and an unmarried woman’s dream in her dream that the hands of a clock Evidence that she is wasting her time on many trivial matters and does not use it for useful matters has passed. If a girl sees one o’clock in the morning in her dream, this indicates that she is walking on the wrong path to reach her goal and must change her path immediately so as not to waste more time unnecessarily. If the dreamer watches the clock hitting someone in his sleep, this means that she has lost many good opportunities as a result of not thinking wisely before making any decision. Watching the clock in her dream for an hour and standing on this number symbolizes that she is not brave and does not accept to face things that It bothers her in life and she feels insecure about everyone around her all the time. What is the interpretation of a dream about a watch for a married woman? Watches in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about peas: seeing eating peas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of peas in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, cooked, dried, canned green, with carrots, buying peas and preparing broth, diet and meat, according to Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of peas in a dream. In the interpretation of seeing peas in a dream, it indicates different meanings and interpretations, according to According to the so-called leading dream interpretation scholars, seeing peas in a dream indicates a good omen and a lot of money and abundant wealth. For the dreamer, but the interpretation of seeing peas in a dream varies depending on the person’s vision. If you see yourself eating peas in a dream, it means good health and a lot of money. As for farmers and their families, it is activity, work and profit. If you see peas planted on the ground, it means that good luck will accompany you in your trade. If you plant peas, it means that your dreams have a solid foundation and you will achieve them soon. If you choose peas, you will succeed in your business and enjoy the fruits of your labor. If you see canned peas, it means that It means that you will live in a state of despair and anguish for a while, then soon you will be lucky and your dreams will come true. When the dreamer sees that he is eating peas in a dream, this indicates good health, safety from diseases and abundance of money. Interpretation of peas in a dream by Ibn Sirin, mentioned by the great sheikh and scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing peas in a dream has meanings that tend to be optimistic, because it is primarily an indicator of the good that the dreamer will receive. Interpretation of a dream about eating peas: Peas in a dream indicate goodness that affects the dreamer, blessing, kindness, and offering. Seeing peas in a dream is joy, comfort, and blessing, therefore Eating peas alone or alongside a meal is very good. Eating peas in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news for a beautiful baby girl who will fill the house with happiness and joy, and seeing peas in a sick person’s dream is a sign of imminent recovery, God willing. As for seeing a person in his dream as if he was dead, giving him or feeding him It means that the dreamer will receive a material or moral benefit from someone he does not know, or that he will travel. He finds goodness and safety in his travels. The best vision is to see a lot of peas, which are green and fresh, which indicates longevity, health and well-being for the beholder, and to see a man eating peas with his wife or a wife with her husband, which indicates friendship and affection between them and the end of marital disputes. Seeing peas spilled or eaten in a dirty and unclean place for a long time, or eaten in an unclean place, as is the case when one eats them in the bathroom. Whoever sees himself eating peas in his dream and is working in the agricultural profession, this indicates abundant profits and many profits from the crops that he produces. The farmer and his family members enjoy it in good health. Interpretation of canned peas in a dream: Whoever sees canned peas in a dream, this indicates despair, pain, and sadness that will affect the fortuneteller for a long time, and bad luck that precedes the joy and happiness that the dreamer will gain in the future. Interpretation of a dream about dried peas in a dream. Saw peas

title: What is the interpretation of eating ice cream in a dream?

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of eating ice cream in a dream. Ice cream is considered a refreshment that adults and children love, especially in the summer, because it helps the body recover from high temperatures, but what does one dream about eating? In this article, we will learn from an encyclopedia about these interpretations with the different situations of ice cream in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of eating ice cream in a dream Symbol of eating ice cream in a dream Whoever sees that he is eating fresh ice cream in a dream, this is good news for him that he will open a project from which he will earn a lot of money. Money, and it is good news for him that he will achieve dreams and he wants to search for it. But if he sees that he is eating spoiled ice cream and not ice cream, then this is a bad vision because it shows that this person will not be able to achieve the dreams and ambitions that he seeks and it also shows that he will lose A lot of money. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees ice cream in a dream shows a lot of good things that the girl will receive and also explains that her next life will be very happy, God willing. Seeing ice cream in a dream is also interpreted for a single girl. With the suitor who will propose to her, and this suitor will be good and fair and will make her happy, God willing, and she will feel comfortable with that person. And if she sees that she is eating very large amounts of ice cream, then this girl is prohibited from doing certain things, and she is trying to get close to those things, and this dream is a warning. To approach her in this way. She does not fall into anything that does not please God Almighty or her parents, and it is also a message for her because she focuses on what benefits her in her life and stays away from what harms her. There are unexpected interpretations of seeing ice cream in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried girl who sees ice cream in a dream indicates separation. If the girl is engaged, she will end her engagement, and if she is in a relationship, she will break up with her lover. A girl who eats chocolate ice cream in a dream heralds a good husband who will be happy in her life, God willing. Eating ice cream in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees that she She eats ice cream and enjoys its delicious taste, then this woman will give birth easily and free of health problems, and God Almighty will be with her a good son and will not make her miserable. Seeing her buying ice cream and distributing it to children is evidence that she loves what is good for everyone and that she will live a happy life, God Almighty willing, with fewer worries and pains. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate ice cream: One of the good dreams is to see him eating chocolate ice cream, as this indicates happiness and good luck that he will enjoy. By the dreamer. Also, seeing chocolate ice cream in a dream can herald the marriage of one of the dreamer’s relatives. It is said that seeing chocolate ice cream in a dream is a sign of good luck and abundant food and that the dreamer will get a prestigious job that he was looking forward to or enter into a profitable business that will bring him A lot of good. As for seeing the throwing of the machine

title: Interpretation of a dream with long hair by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream with long, smooth hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair: Interpreters believe that the dream indicates goodness and brings a lot of news to the dreamer. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of a long poetic vision for the single, the married, the pregnant, the divorced, and the male, according to Ibn Sirin. And the sheikhs of interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about having long hair? Seeing long hair in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s long life and, in general, a bad improvement in his health condition, as it symbolizes the dreamer’s accumulation of worries and his inability to solve his problems. If The visionary person is going through a financial crisis at the present time and dreams that his hair is long. This indicates that his financial conditions will improve and that he will soon obtain a large sum of money. He must be patient and strong and ask the Lord. (Glory be to Him, the Almighty) to give him a speedy recovery. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about long hair heralds the dreamer increasing his money, the scope of his livelihood and gaining many blessings and good things in the coming period of his life and long hair in a man’s dream. It is an indication of his high position in society, his good morals and people’s love for him, but in the case of insight that he was poor and dreamed that his hair was long so that he would be deficient in some duties, and God Almighty wanted to return it to him in a beautiful way through this warning vision. And if a woman sees That her hair in the vision is longer than it is in reality and she feels happy and cheerful, this indicates a pleasant surprise that will soon knock on her door and positively affect her life. On the day the delivery is approaching and it will be easy and smooth. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a single womanInterpretation scholars believe that seeing long hair for unmarried women is good and indicates the abundance of goodness and livelihood. Difficulties in her life at the present time, and she dreamed that her hair was long, this indicates her relief from her distress and her emergence from crises. If an unmarried woman gets engaged and sees in her dream that her hair is very long, this leads her to face problems with her partner in the coming period that may lead to separation, But if she is currently living a love story and sees her long, soft hair in her dream, then this foretells that her partner will soon propose to her and his story will culminate in a happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman: Seeing long hair for a married woman portends positive changes in her life very soon, If the dreamer sees her hair long and thick in her dream, this indicates that she feels psychological comfort and happiness after a long period of sadness and anxiety. If the virtuous woman is trying to have children and dreams that her husband has long hair, then she has good news of the approaching pregnancy, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Long, black hair in a dream is a sign. However, a married woman will get a lot of money soon without difficulty and in a way she does not expect. Future. Interpretation of a dream about folded hair

title: The 10 most important interpretations of seeing a promise in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What does it mean to see a good man who promised it? It indicates the sustenance and goodness that the dreamer receives. What is the interpretation of seeing dead people promising goodness? An indication of the goodness that the dreamer obtains. What is the meaning of seeing a covenant broken with a lover? It symbolizes the monarch and that he is not trustworthy. What does it mean to see a good man who promised it? Is the interpretation of the vision to set its date? It indicates the dreamer’s love for order and commitment. What is the benefit of an absolute vision with which you agree on a good relationship? A sign of getting rid of problems and worries. What is the interpretation of the vision of the promise of obtaining money? Evidence of the huge amounts of money that you will obtain soon. What does the vision mean? Fulfilling the covenant in a dream? Qualities that are good. Interpretation of seeing a promise in a dream. If the dreamer sees a good person promised to him in a dream, this indicates the sustenance and goodness that the dreamer will gain. As for seeing an undesirable thing promising divine goodness, it is a sign of his misfortune and evil. While watching the enemy It is a sign of goodness and success in practical life. The dream also symbolizes a promise that the dreamer must fulfill in reality. Seeing a close person smiling to fulfill a promise is a sign of good morals. The dream shows the goodness and kindness that the dreamer has received. If the young man sees that he trusts someone If one has money, the vision foretells that he will find a suitable job during this period. Interpretation of a dream about a promise by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a promise in a dream has many different interpretations. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the promise of goodness in a dream is evidence of longevity and abundance of sustenance. If one sees in A dream is that an enemy has promised good, then bad things will happen to him. Whoever sees inside the dream that he has made a promise to himself and taken the same covenant, that is, he is a person who is able to bear responsibility and knows his rights and duties. Whoever promises another person in a dream, this is a sign of kindness and blessings. Interpretation of seeing dead people In a dream, the deceased’s promise of goodness in the dream is an indication of the good that the dreamer will receive. Also, seeing the deceased promises something bad in a dream, warning that he will harm the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the name Waad in a dream for a married woman: Seeing the name Waad in a dream means longevity. Hassan said. If a married woman sees a promise in a dream that he does not fulfill, it is a sign that he hates betrayal. Seeing a promise that has not been fulfilled indicates that the woman knows hypocrisy. Breaking a promise in a dream symbolizes the emergence of disagreements with the husband and may lead to separation. A promise of kindness in a dream, It indicates the sustenance and happy life that a married woman enjoys. Seeing a dead person promising to do evil is a sign of disobedience and immorality that she is committing, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone else’s promise in a dream. A famous person’s appointment in a dream is evidence of the believer’s sincerity and commitment to fulfilling the covenant. The vision symbolizes The dreamer's closeness to his Lord is good, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is making many promises in a dream, this is an indication that the dreamer will perform his duties poorly at work or in his family. Seeing a promise from relatives means that the dreamer will acquire great wealth. Make a will with someone you love. In the dream it symbolizes To the monarch and that he is not trustworthy. Seeing what is behind the will with the deceased indicates

title: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding and breastfeeding a child in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Contents: I breastfed a child who breastfed a child other than my own on the honest front. An unmarried girl breastfeeds a child from an unmarried girl. Breastfeeding in a dream is one of the beautiful, distinctive and wonderful dreams that we often have, especially for women, as it has many important interpretations and meanings that come to a person in reality, as breastfeeding is one of the most important Things for an infant who begins to fully build his body, and continues to breastfeed for about two years, and it is one of the important divine matters that God has bestowed on women. Below we review for you in our article today the interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream according to the international translator Ibn Sirin, who explained it completely. Interpretation Breastfeeding in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding a child, this is a sign of great goodness and great happiness that will come to her and that she will obtain. The dream of breastfeeding an unmarried girl indicates an imminent marriage and obtaining a request or desire that she was waiting for, trying to achieve, and wishing for it to happen in her life outside the framework of Marriage. Or it is a sign for him that after her marriage she will give birth to a child who will be a good husband later. Breastfeeding in a dream for a single girl indicates the confidence of those around her and she is reconciling with her religion and has happiness in her life, but if the child cries in his arms, the dream may turn into a disaster. You know Dream that a married woman is breastfeeding. She will have a child of the same gender as the child she sees in the dream during pregnancy, and it may be news of her recovery from a disease she is carrying. If the breast is full of milk in the dream, this is a sign of happiness and joy. If you dream that someone is breastfeeding from your breast, This indicates confinement and distress for the breastfeeding woman, and the dream does not bring you any good. The discharge of a liquid substance from the breast during breastfeeding is a sign of nutrition, goodness and money, while the secretion of a solid substance is a bad omen. If you dream that you are breastfeeding, then your dream symbolizes sadness and humiliation. If a woman dreams If a man breastfeeds from her breast, then he takes from her, against her will, what she breastfeeds. A dream about breastfeeding from a mother’s breast indicates honor and status. Interpretation of breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Breastfeeding from the left breast in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a good heart and good intentions. Seeing a child being breastfed in a married woman’s dream who was an unborn child. Her child, this indicates imprisonment, anxiety, and sadness. The dream indicates that the dreamer is blessed with a degree of tenderness, kindness, and purity of heart. If a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child and does not have children, then the dream indicates pregnancy. Breastfeeding an older child or breastfeeding a man in a dream indicates problems and fears. If he sees A man in a dream sees that he is breastfeeding a child, this indicates his need for affection and familiarity. Seeing a pregnant woman breastfeeding a small child in a dream means sustenance and profit. Breastfeeding a large child in a dream indicates fears and problems. Breastfeeding a child in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates pregnancy disorders. An unmarried girl, if she dreams of breastfeeding Baby, indicates the approach of marriage. Breastfeeding a baby in a dream is one with an exit

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing underwear in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Many of the clothes that we wear and buy all the time, because elegance in appearance is a goal that everyone wants, but there is a type of clothing that we do not see and it is the basic and it differs from women to men, so it is called underwear and some of it is called special clothing, so seeing it in a dream is one of the strange things. There are many explanations for the unknown, and from this dream, scientists interpret underwear in a woman’s dream. And men. Since the clothes are different, the interpretations are almost different and in this topic you have everything related to the interpretation of the dream of seeing underwear in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing underwear in a dreamSeeing underwear in a dream indicates a lack of self-confidence and low self-esteem. Seeing underwear can indicate In a dream also indicates a loss of privacy in real life. The dream can also indicate the fear of expressing the sincere feelings that the viewer has towards someone. Seeing underwear in a dream indicates manufacturing and the dreamer’s fear of his behavior. Also, I may still be afraid of Expressing an opinion. But if the viewer feels that the presence of underwear in the dream does not cause him discomfort, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s ability to express the feelings that he is trying to hide. If the dreamer dreams that he forgot to wear underwear, this indicates his fear of revealing his secret. If he sees in his dream that another person is wearing underwear, then this is evidence of that person’s honesty with the fortune teller. As for a person looking at dirty underwear, this is evidence of a lack of self-confidence. If the dreamer is married, then seeing underwear comforts and relaxes him. Unmarried, this is a sign of problems in his life. If a person sees red underwear, this is a sign of joy and love for life. Seeing torn underwear in a dream means poverty and anxiety. Underwear in one’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees underwear or nightgowns in a dream, This indicates a large number of suitors who want to marry her, and perhaps her engagement is approaching, and God knows best. Single people who buy underwear in a dream are nothing but love and a desire for life. White and clean clothes for a person are good and a blessing with money and perhaps happiness soon. Old clothes for unmarried women are bad and appear a lot on them. Of the problems and fears that you suffer from. Adding a young man’s underwear in a dream is bad and indicates envy and hatred. Perhaps someone wants to harm her and she needs to take care of her. Underwear in a married woman’s dream. A married woman who sees a lot of underwear in a dream is evidence On the many benefits that she will obtain and perhaps an imminent pregnancy by God’s command. Buying underwear in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions for a married woman and an indication of the love and tenderness that binds her to her husband, and the vision may reflect the woman’s beauty and good morals. A married woman’s underwear interpreted the dream

title: Cutting a man's hair in a dream

preview.html: Through this article, we will explain to you the general and comprehensive meaning of this vision in detail. Interpretation of seeing hair cut in a dream for a single girl. Many dream interpreters may see that an unmarried girl sees herself cutting her hair in a dream. This is an indication of some problems that you may face, and God Almighty is Most High. While if a girl sees that she is cutting her hair, her hair is beautiful and long as well. The vision may indicate the changes she is going through in waking life. But if an unmarried girl sees in a dream someone cutting her hair. The vision can bring a lot of good news, with the date approaching. Her wedding if she is engaged. And if the girl sees that she is cutting her hair and regrets it. The vision may indicate some failure in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if he sees a girl cutting her hair, and he cries over her in the dream. This vision may mean that he is not satisfied with his general appearance. This may indicate that she is dissatisfied with something in her life. Some dream interpreters say that the girl’s hair was cut in a dream by someone she knows, which means that he was the one who cut her hair. This vision is an indication of the good that will come to him from This person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that her husband cuts her hair. This vision is not promising and he must pray a lot and not tell anyone about the vision. But if a married woman sees that her husband He cuts her hair, and she wishes him in a dream. The vision may indicate that there are some problems that you can overlook in reality. But if a married woman sees that she cuts her hair and regrets it in a dream. This vision may be evidence of making wrong decisions in her life, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is cutting her hair and does not care about it or does not care about the dream. This vision shows that there is something big in her life, but she does not care about it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A married woman’s dream of going to a hairdresser and cutting her hair with him in a dream can be interpreted. It may This vision means that there is something that she is doing alone. But if a married woman sees that she is cutting her hair and she is crying in the dream. This vision has the meaning that there are some crises in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the vision of cutting hair in a man’s dream and its meaning. When a married man dreams that he He cuts his hair. This vision may carry some meanings related to his married life. It appears that you dream of a married man cutting his hair. In some marital matters related to his personal marital life, such as problems and the like. But if the married man sees that he is cutting his hair, and this is not enough in the dream. It may be proven This vision is that there is a decision related to his life and this decision, he is not satisfied with it in reality. But if the married man sees that he is cutting his hair, he is happy with it in the dream. This vision expresses the presence of problems surrounding him, but he will get rid of them soon, God willing. And if the married man sees That her husband cuts his hair in a dream. This vision may express instability, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if a married man sees that his wife is cutting

title: Interpretation of a swimming pool in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream is one of the most requested interpretations by people. The pool is the place where you can practice swimming, and the pool can be in many places, such as clubs, summer resorts and other places, and children or adults can exercise in it. Dream interpretation scholars differed, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Depending on the state of the fortuneteller in the pool, the interpretation of seeing the pool in a dream also varies according to the viewer, whether he is male or female, whether the man is single or married, and whether the woman is unmarried, married or pregnant. The interpretation of these things varies. So let us get to know the interpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream.Interpretation of a swimming pool in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream according to Ibn SirinoIf one sees a swimming pool in a dream. This is evidence that this person hides his sorrows and pain. So much so that he wants to cry but cannot cry even if someone sees himself swimming in the pool in a dream. This is evidence that this person will start a new life and work to achieve his goals that he dreamed of, and if a person sees a swimming pool in his dream. This also shows that this person is trying to understand himself and is trying to stand up to his mistakes. He corrects it and works to advance his scientific or practical life. Interpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing a swimming pool in a dream has many interpretations that vary depending on the situation. He said: If he dreams that he is playing in a pond near his house. This is evidence that this person will hear the good news that he has been waiting to hear, and if a person sees himself playing in the pool in his dream. This indicates that this person will acquire great wealth. The result of the work he does, and if one sees himself drinking water from the pond in a dream. This is evidence that this person will undertake many projects that change his life. Interpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream when you are single, and if an unmarried woman sees a swimming pool in a dream. Its visibility varies depending on the type of water in the pond. If an unmarried woman sees a pond in a dream and the water in that pond is clean. This indicates the approaching marriage of this woman, and that this woman will marry someone with noble qualities, and their married life will be happy, but if the unmarried woman sees in her dream that the water of this pond is cloudy. This is evidence that the man will advance to this woman, and this man only applies if the single woman sees him playing in the pool. This is evidence that this woman is doing useless things that waste time and effort, but if an unmarried woman sees a swimming pool in a dream, this is evidence that she needs a lot of effort and work. To achieve the goals that you want to achieve. Interpretation of seeing a swimming pool in a dream for a married woman: And if a married woman sees a swimming pool in her dream? This is evidence that God Almighty will provide her with stability in her married life, and she will be happy with her husband and raise her children well, but if a married woman sees in her dream a

title: Interpretation of a dream about gossip and what a person says in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of gossip in a dream of a single woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, if someone drowns you, it hurts me. Therefore, if the dream is about misdemeanors, it means that one will harm another without knowing it. It is better to be careful, especially when there are strangers you do not know living near and around you. A dream in which you see someone speaking bad words means that you need to be vigilant because people are planning to destroy your things and can cause you a lot of harm. (Backbiting on Others) in a dream indicates the extinction of blessings, because backbiting eats up good deeds, just as fire eats up firewood. The vision shows that there are people planning to sabotage your projects that have been laboring to build for a long time, as if you are working to build a relationship with a specific person and another party is interfering in it, and as a result you fail. This relationship or it may be a business project that you were working on and was on your way to success, but due to the intervention of a third party or your competitor, you were unable to achieve your goal. Therefore, you have to search in your life for people who are likely to be reasons for ending your goals and work to remove them from your life to remove Those reasons so you can get where you want. Make sure you only connect people you understand with those who understand your ideas. People who like to talk about others should be avoided at all costs, especially in the workplace. Make sure you are connected to the right people who will allow you to gather the right positive energy to do the right thing at the right time. (And whoever dreams) that he is behind a man, and if the backbiting is due to poverty, it returns to him. Poverty, and if it is a scandal, it will return to him, as well as to others, it will return. . A sting in a dream is due to its harm to its owner. If a person sees himself in a dream that he has disappeared on the ground, this indicates a long journey, and the absence of the sick person means death, because lovers are watching and revealing. And whoever dreams: that the earth is lacking without digging and its depth is so great that he thinks that it will not He rises, because he is arrogant with the needs of the world. Chasing: It returns its evil to its owner, so if he chases a man because of poverty, he harms him with poverty, and if he harms him with something else, he is harmed by that thing. The senser destroys grace, and the eavesdropping is no good. Interpretation of someone’s action in a dreamIf you dream that you are speaking in a manner Bad about someone, it indicates that you will be in trouble if you do not stop doing something that you are currently doing. Be sure to think about your actions, because the consequences will be dire. This could mean that every little mistake you make will be extremely annoying. If you dream that someone answers you, this means that you will face problems in your family life. Interpretation of seeing friends insulting someone in a dream. Circumstances will change from good to bad if you join others in wailing and gossiping. Interpretation of my friends drowning me in a dream. If you dream that there is a group of your friends talking about you, The dream indicates that you should be careful and take care of the servants and the weak in your life, as you imagine that there are none
